settings.title: Add a title or tagline
settings.text: Share blog posts, products, or promotions with your customers. Use this text to describe products, share details on availability and style, or as a space to display recent reviews or FAQs.

settings.third_des: Experience the rejuvenating power of the Earth’s best uplifting plant in it’s purest, most bioavailable form.

settings.heading: Full-Spectrum Hemp Extract
settings.sub_heading: Apart from CBD, our full-spectrum hemp extract contains multiple naturally occuring cannabinoids such as CBN and CBDV

settings.heading: Medium Chain Triglyceride
settings.sub_heading: CBD and other cannabinoids are fat soluble and are most effective when taken with saturated fats, such as MCT oil. MCT allows a larger concentration of CBD to be absorbed into the bloodstream, therby quickening its effects.

settings.heading: Organic Hempseed Oil
settings.sub_heading: betterCBD contains organic hempseed oil which provides essentially fatty acids, vitamins, and minerals

settings.heading: Organic Mint Extract
settings.sub_heading: This essence is used to improve the flavor of betterCBD.

settings.heading: the power of CBD
settings.sub_heding: Cannabidiol (CBD) is more than just CBD. With full-spectrum hemp oil, there’s an “entourage effect” of various cannabinoids, terpenes, antioxidants, and neuroprotectants that work together to radically optimize mood, immune function, and overall well-being

settings.heading: HOW DOES IT WORK?
settings.sub_heding: The body has many “systems” that we are sure you’re familiar with: the nervous sytem, the immune system, the circulatory system, etc.. But there is also a lesser-known system known as the endocannabinoid system (ECS), which is a powerful biological system that influences many aspects of human health: such as mood, cognitive function, pain perception, immune function and much, much more. This cannabinoid system can be positively influenced by consuming phytocannbinoids, like CBD and other plant-based cannabinoids found in full-spectrum hemp oil extract such as betterCBD.

settings.third_des: Organic. Grown in the USA. Bioavailable
